website_summaries.verdict: This traditionally styled quilted nap mat is beautifully thick and comfortable. Blanket-free design is safe for younger babies.
pros: Polyester microfiber construction is hypoallergenic and snuggly soft
Lofty, pillow-like design is comfortable and cozy
Safe for the washing machine on delicate cycle and can be tossed in the dryer on low
cons: A bit of extra width would be great for playtime

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tummy time blanket

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, would buy again.

I'm hoping my daughter loves it as much as I loved my puff quilt growing up.
